review_en: Cheonggye Stream, an artificial natural attraction in Seoul that has been plagued by negative reviews and negative factors but is still loved... The stream is open in the heart of Seoul, and when you walk along the waterfront and look at the sky, you forget for a moment whether it is Seoul or not. The sound of water flowing is a temporary respite and creates a certain flow in the chaos of the mind, making it comfortable. It also makes you feel the joy of walking again. At night the mood is deeper and more pleasant. It's been a long way since the water. Now, it's better to think of it as a happy part of Seoul where you can put down other thoughts and enjoy only good things.
